Overview Chapter

class AnimObj

Constructors and Destructors
AnimObjSets default values to private members.
Operations
Execute Event handler will return TRUE when animation cycle occurs.
IsPlaying Check if animation is currently in play mode.
ResetTime Reset the internal timer.
SetForward Set the animation to playback in a forward order.
SetInfo Set animation frame conditions.
SetLooping Enable/Disable looping of animation.
SetReverse Set the animation to playback in a backward order.
Start Starts an animation.
Stop Stops an animation.
Data Members
private
INT16 m_CurrentFrame;Current frame index.
UINT8 m_DelayType;Delay type.
BOOL m_IsLoopy;Flag for animation loop state.
BOOL m_IsPlaying;Flag for animation play state.
UINT16 m_MSDelay;Delay in Milliseconds.
INT16 m_StepRate;Step rate of animation.
INT16 m_TotalFrames;Total number of frames.
DWORD m_dwTime;Animations current time.
